categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic squads

nodes.text: The "Heroes of Yavin" was a name given to a squad in the Rebel Alliance that was led by Princess Leia Organa during their conflict against the Galactic Empire.

The Heroes of Yavin first appeared in Star Wars 1, published in 2015. In Star Wars Legends, Leia Organa's small cadre of Rebels was referred to as the "Heroes of Yavin." This name was brought into canon by the 2016 Star Wars Helmet Collection 12. Marvel Comics' first Star Wars series of comics, released from 1977 to 1986, referred to the Heroes of Yavin as "Star Warriors."
